TextArea standard example:

```js
<TextArea
  placeholder="I am placeholder"
/>
```


TextArea with error example:

```js
<TextArea
  placeholder="I am placeholder"
  errors={["I am error one", "I am error two"]}
/>
```

TextArea with label example:

```js
<TextArea
  placeholder="I am placeholder"
  label="Hello World"
/>
```

TextArea with label & error example:

```js
<TextArea
  placeholder="I am placeholder"
  label="Hello World"
  errors={["I am error one", "I am error two"]}
/>
```
